content.description: Which of the following choices correctly describes how the values of <math alttext="F sub A B" overflow="scroll"> <msub> <mi>F</mi> <mi>AB</mi> </msub> </math> and <math alttext="F sub B C" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>F</mi><mi>BC</mi></msub></math> change if the small disk is moved and attached to the top of Block <math alttext="C" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></math> and the experiment is repeated with the same constant force <math alttext="F" overflow="scroll"><mi>F</mi></math> exerted on Block <math alttext="A" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></math>?
content.question: <math alttext="F sub A B" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>F</mi><mi>AB</mi></msub></math> <math alttext="F sub B C" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>F</mi><mi>BC</mi></msub></math> A Increases Stays the same B Decreases Increases C Stays the same Decreases D Stays the same Increases

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
